headline: Is Ventas (VTR) The Best REIT Dividend Stock to Buy for Non-AI Trade?
summary: We recently published Top 10 Trending Stocks Everyone’s Watching in Q4. Ventas Inc (NYSE:VTR) is one of the trending stocks everyone’s watching. Morningstar’s Dave Sekera said in a recent program on Schwab Network that investors are not paying attention to non-AI stocks as their focus remains on growth.
